name: AI Product Factory - S3 Storage Operations

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO project_state (
  project_id, project_name, session_id, current_phase, phase_status,
  last_iteration_score, tech_standards_global, tech_standards_local,
  total_iterations, total_duration_ms, config, full_state
) VALUES (
  $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7::jsonb, $8::jsonb, $9, $10, $11::jsonb, $12::jsonb
)
ON CONFLICT (project_id) DO UPDATE SET
  project_name = EXCLUDED.project_name,
  session_id = EXCLUDED.session_id,
  current_phase = EXCLUDED.current_phase,
  phase_status = EXCLUDED.phase_status,
  last_iteration_score = EXCLUDED.last_iteration_score,
  tech_standards_global = EXCLUDED.tech_standards_global,
  tech_standards_local = EXCLUDED.tech_standards_local,
  total_iterations = EXCLUDED.total_iterations,
  total_duration_ms = EXCLUDED.total_duration_ms,
  config = EXCLUDED.config,
  full_state = EXCLUDED.full_state,
  updated_at = NOW()
